name: Disorderly Combat
description:
Overview

Disorderly Combat is a fast-paced 3D movement shooter where you can have the power to manipulate energy to your advantage.  In this game, the player’s energy doubles as their health, with energy decaying each time they move. You will have access to the Entropy System, a mechanic that allows them to drain energy from their surroundings to refill their own. This system also provides the unique ability to fire condensed energy as a damaging output. These take the form as “Entropy Weapons”.

In Disorderly Combat, you are tasked with eradicating foes in a level. By playing aggressive and stylishly, players can build “Discord”, build enough and you can enter the “Discord State”, this state providing you with gameplay bonuses such as increased energy. To survive you must keep your energy topped up while using “Entropy Weapons” to manipulate the terrain and take out enemies to reach the end.

Features

Get to the goal as fast as you can, while your energy drains as you move! Traverse an expansive level filled with interactable objects to absorb energy from! Release Entropy Weapons, at the cost of your Energy, to activate objects!
Gain special Entropy Weapons, each with their own traits and behaviour! Controls

 Move - [W] [A] [S] [D]

 Jump - [SPACE]

Absorb - [LEFT MOUSE BUTTON] (hold)

Release - [RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON]

Switch Weapon - [Q]
